attributes.action: Stop the building of a £200m national flagship. It’s a colossal waste of money.
attributes.additional_details: Using public funds to build a ship to sail around the World is a mistake. The return on the investment for such a vessel has not been substantiated.  In addition, the ongoing maintenance costs required throughout the ships life would be better and more wisely spent on initiatives within the U.K.
attributes.background: Reject attempts to use public funds to build a national flagship to promote trade around the World. It’s a colossal waste of money and would be better spent on supporting initiatives within the U.K.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
